name: ACE EdVenture
description: We are ACE EdVenture, developing the next generation of leaders to have Real-World Value Now! We have one mission that unites both staff and students: setting the standard in keeping with the speed of change in the world. With about 310 members of staff across three campuses, we have a vibrant and innovative community and are always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our values. We are growing and evolving, but we can only do this with the help of our staff and students. We work together to create a culture and education ecosystem that Unleashes the students’ Greatness. We welcome you to join us as part of the globally recognised International Schools team.

Highlights.name: The Only Way Forward is to Transform
Highlights.description: In today’s fast changing world, being only academically qualified doesn’t make the cut anymore. It’s common that graduates end up being mediocre in the workforce. Worse still, some struggle to even find stability and security.

Highlights.name: Our Education Ecosystem
Highlights.description: Just like how every child is unique in their own way. Our Education Ecosystem ensures that our schools are not Cookie Cutters and offer unique (if not magical) experiences for our students!

enhanced_description: ACE EdVenture is a globally recognized International Schools team founded in 1995, dedicated to transformational education that develops the next generation of leaders with real-world value. Operating with approximately 310 staff members across three campuses, they foster an innovative education ecosystem focused on unleashing student greatness. A key differentiator is their teaching staff, composed of real-world industry experts who undergo an internal Finland-certified training program, ensuring high qualifications and practical relevance. The organization emphasizes setting standards to keep pace with global changes, aiming to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, build diverse and inclusive workforces, and enhance employee happiness and engagement.
